title: 3 ways people are restoring nature and building rural livelihoods in Africa | UpLink

tasks.task: ** Teach a simple trick for managing car keys.
subtasks: ** Introduce the problem of losing car keys.
** Explain how to use chopsticks to hold the key.
** Describe the benefits of this method (e.g., easy access, space-saving).
** Indicate the applicability to different vehicles.
** Encourage the audience to try the method.
